reviews.review: BEST GAME IVE EVER PLAYED WORTH THE BUY
Игра прикольная с головоломками и кооперативом
By far my all time favorite puzzle game. Great puzzles and sense of accomplishment. Amazing story and characters, also great sense of humor. Great artwork and music. Much longer than the first.
Such a good game, it makes my brain work
This has to be my favorite game. It's witty, engaging, and has puzzles. Every time I play, I'm pleasantly surprised as to how good it is. If you have the cash but don't have this game, then get it.
probably even better than the first part
played coop with a friend, got diagnosed with trust issues

Portal 2 çöp sistemlerin bile kaldırdığı gayet optimize ve hoş grafiklere sahip zeka oyunu her yaş kitlesine uygun arkadaşınızla ve tek oynayabilmenizde gayet hoş diyicek birşey yok girip beyninizi yakabilirsiniz zaten ucuz oyun

Very, very lovely and professionally made game by Valve. Wonderful for older folks, but can prove a challenge for the especially elderly as it has mechanics that might be a bit confusing. Definitely good as a mental workout though! Very enjoyable, original, captivating, and immersive story mode as well.
One of the best stories ever told in a game. Fantastic Gameplay and Puzzles. Great Comedic moments and funny jokes. One of the best Games Valve has ever made. Play it.

honestly, one of the greatest fucking games i've played through, got no issues with the game. both co-op and the main story are absolutely awesome, glados is proboably programmed just to bully you, and that's awesome! I recomend the game for every person that just has the bit of money to purchase it

cheers!
One of the best pieces of media ever made, seriously, if you haven't yet, buy it. The ending always gets me.
Very Fun. Would recommend this game. never gets old.

After 11 Years, Portal 2 still holds up well and is one of Valve's best franchises. I had so much fun going through all the tests and discovering all the secrets of Aperture, and new technologies like RTX breathe new life into this masterpiece of a game.
Really like the portal game, plus the new coop mode great and the community maps just tops it up
Ищи устройство которое делает отверстия. Не пулевые а... Ну ты разберешься.

Un classique absolu, qui a très bien vieilli. À jouer immédiatement !

Et n'oubliez pas : cette patate génère 1,1 volt d'électricité. Je n'ai littéralement [i]pas[/i] l'énergie de vous mentir.
El mejor juego de Valve sin dudas, hermoso todo, la historia el gameplay y el soundtrack.
Дорогой дневник, мне не подобрать слов, чтобы описать боль и унижение, которые я испытал.
Great unique puzzle game with comedic narration
Портал на потолок ,портал на пол и почувствуй себя ракетой
I knew it was great game, but didn't expect it had so much funny lore and amazing voice acting :O
Как по мне игра крутая! Графика топ, сюжет и вообще вся задумка, если ты не играл в этот щедевер, то очень рекомендую

портал-портал, жижа-беги жижа-прыгай жижа-портал
10/10 жижи
10/10 порталов
10/10 как пройти

Шедевр на века. Мега кайфовый сюжет,просто умопомрачающие локации,просто невиданных размеров,даже в современных играх такого не видел. Мало того что тут просто БОМБИЧЕСКИЙ сингл плеер так еще и есть совместная игра + лвлов с интернета. ИГРА Ш - Е - Д - Е - В - Р !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 1 0 0 / 10
Oyun dışında beyaz duvarlara portal açamıyorsunuz. :/

The story is awesome. the characters are enjoyable and well written, the gameplay is fantastic, Co-op is really fun and the jokes are funny.

I should have written a longer review but this will hopefully give you an interest for the game (please buy it it's so good)

One of the best games I have ever played, very challenging game MAKE YOUR BRAIN BIGGG!!!, it is a valve game that means it is really wonderful game, it has also a lot of story, action and funny moments!
класний сюжет запам'ятався хоч гра недуже нова але цікава і гарна графіка (а ще гарна картопля) коли граєш разом це тест на розум і кмітливість
лучшее во что я играл в жизни. valve спасибо.
Мы все хотели попасть в портал и вот игра которая позволила это сделать...мы в портале...дырка в стенке, дырка в стенке....минус голова...тарам пам пам....
cant speed run w friends, just play portal 1
super gra. mówię. jak w nią gram to mam wrażenie jakbym grał na rtx
love this game because of wheatly and GLaDOS!
this game is such a brain test. It is purely gold.

전작인 <Portal>의 플레이가 혁신적이긴 했으나 난이도가 너무 쉬워서 아쉬웠다면. <Portal 2>는 정말 완벽하게 적당한 난이도를 가지고 있는 게임이라 감히 말할 수 있음. 살면서 해본 게임 중에 이보다 완벽한 난이도의 게임은 없었다.

포탈 시리즈 안해본 사람이 솔직히 부러움. 이걸 아직도 안해봤다고?
hurts my brain but very funny and enjoyable
I wish this game could go on forever, or had many ways to get to alternate endings, because i never want to stop playing.

Ta hra je skvělá, pokud jste jí nehráli silně doporučuji. Troufnu si říct že to je možná lepší než Half Life 2. A dle mně každý člověk na steamu by si měl Portal 2 zahrát. 10/10 Bodů
